1: -module(doc_html_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: %% callbacks
    4: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
    5: 
    6: %% test format
    7: -export([convert_erlang_html/1, convert_unknown_format/1]).
    8: 
    9: %% test non-existing moduledoc
   10: -export([non_existing_moduledoc/1,hidden_moduledoc/1,existing_moduledoc/1]).
   11: 
   12: %% test non-existing docs
   13: -export([non_existing_doc/1, hidden_doc/1, existing_doc/1]).
   14: 
   15: %% headings
   16: -export([h1_test/1, h2_test/1, h3_test/1, h4_test/1, h5_test/1, h6_test/1]).
   17: 
   18: %% quotes
   19: -export([single_line_quote_test/1, double_char_for_quote_test/1,
   20:          ignore_three_spaces_before_quote/1, multiple_line_quote_test/1,
   21:          paragraph_in_between_test/1]).
   22: 
   23: %% paragraph
   24: -export([paragraph_after_heading_test/1, quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% inline code
   27: -export([single_line_code_test/1, multiple_line_code_test/1, paragraph_between_code_test/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% fence code
   30: -export([single_line_fence_code_test/1, multiple_line_fence_code_test/1, paragraph_between_fence_code_test/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% br
   33: -export([start_with_br_test/1, multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test/1,
   34:          multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test/1, ending_br_test/1]).
   35: 
   36: %% Comments
   37: -export([begin_comment_test/1, after_paragraph_comment/1, forget_closing_comment/1 ]).
   38: 
   39: %% Format
   40: -export([format_heading_test/1, format_paragraph_test/1, format_multiple_inline/1,
   41:          format_multiple_inline_format_short/1, format_multiple_inline_format_long/1,
   42:          format_multiple_inline_format_mixed/1, unmatched_format_simple/1,
   43:          unmatched_format_with_inline/1, unmatched_complex_format_with_inline/1,
   44:          format_inline_link_with_inline/1, complex_inline_format/1, skip_symbols_in_inline/1,
   45:          format_header_identifier/1]).
   46: 
   47: %% Bullet lists
   48: -export([singleton_bullet_list/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_with_format/1,
   49:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1,
   50:          multiline_bullet_indented_list/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list2/1,
   51:          multiline_bullet_list/1, even_nested_bullet_list/1, odd_nested_bullet_list/1,
   52:          complex_nested_bullet_list/1, complex_nested_bullet_list2/1]).
   53: 
   54: %% Numbered lists
   55: -export([singleton_numbered_list/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph/1,
   56:          singleton_numbered_list_with_format/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1,
   57:          singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1, multiline_numbered_indented_list/1,
   58:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2/1, multiline_numbered_list/1, even_nested_numbered_list/1,
   59:       odd_nested_numbered_list/1]).
   60: 
   61: -define(ERLANG_HTML, <<"application/erlang+html">>).
   62: 
   63: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   64: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   65: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   66: 
   67: 
   68: -define(EXPECTED_FUN(Expected), {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Expected, #{}}).
   69: 
   70: all() ->
   71:     [{group, different_format_generator},
   72:      {group, module_generator},
   73:      {group, doc_generator},
   74:      {group, header_generator},
   75:      {group, quote_generator},
   76:      {group, paragraph_generator},
   77:      {group, code_generator},
   78:      {group, fence_code_generator},
   79:      {group, br_generator},
   80:      {group, comment_generator},
   81:      {group, format_generator},
   82:      {group, bullet_list_generator},
   83:      {group, numbered_list_generator}
   84:     ].
   85: 
   86: groups() ->
   87:     [{different_format_generator, [parallel], different_format_conversion_tests()},
   88:      {module_generator, [sequence], moduledoc_tests()},
   89:      {doc_generator, [parallel], doc_tests()},
   90:      {header_generator, [parallel], header_tests()},
   91:      {quote_generator, [parallel], quote_tests()},
   92:      {paragraph_generator, [parallel], paragraph_tests()},
   93:      {code_generator, [parallel], code_tests()},
   94:      {fence_code_generator, [parallel], fence_code_tests()},
   95:      {br_generator, [parallel], br_tests()},
   96:      {comment_generator, [parallel], comment_tests()},
   97:      {format_generator, [parallel], format_tests()},
   98:      {bullet_list_generator, [parallel], bullet_list_tests()},
   99:      {numbered_list_generator, [parallel], numbered_list_tests()}
  100:     ].
  101: 
  102: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  103:     Config.
  104: 
  105: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: different_format_conversion_tests() ->
  109:     [ convert_erlang_html,
  110:       convert_unknown_format
  111:     ].
  112: 
  113: moduledoc_tests() ->
  114:     [ non_existing_moduledoc,
  115:       hidden_moduledoc,
  116:       existing_moduledoc
  117:     ].
  118: 
  119: doc_tests() ->
  120:     [ non_existing_doc,
  121:       hidden_doc,
  122:       existing_doc
  123:     ].
  124: 
  125: header_tests() ->
  126:     [ h1_test,
  127:       h2_test,
  128:       h3_test,
  129:       h4_test,
  130:       h5_test,
  131:       h6_test
  132:     ].
  133: 
  134: quote_tests() ->
  135:     [ single_line_quote_test,
  136:       double_char_for_quote_test,
  137:       ignore_three_spaces_before_quote,
  138:       multiple_line_quote_test,
  139:       paragraph_in_between_test
  140:     ].
  141: 
  142: paragraph_tests() ->
  143:     [ paragraph_after_heading_test,
  144:       quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test
  145:     ].
  146: 
  147: code_tests() ->
  148:     [ single_line_code_test,
  149:       multiple_line_code_test,
  150:       paragraph_between_code_test
  151:     ].
  152: 
  153: fence_code_tests() ->
  154:   [single_line_fence_code_test,
  155:    multiple_line_fence_code_test,
  156:    paragraph_between_fence_code_test
  157:   ].
  158: 
  159: br_tests() ->
  160:     [ start_with_br_test,
  161:       multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test,
  162:       multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test,
  163:       ending_br_test
  164:     ].
  165: 
  166: comment_tests() ->
  167:     [ begin_comment_test,
  168:       after_paragraph_comment,
  169:       forget_closing_comment
  170:     ].
  171: 
  172: format_tests() ->
  173:     [ format_heading_test,
  174:       format_paragraph_test,
  175:       format_multiple_inline,
  176:       format_multiple_inline_format_long,
  177:       format_multiple_inline_format_short,
  178:       format_multiple_inline_format_mixed,
  179:       unmatched_format_simple,
  180:       unmatched_format_with_inline,
  181:       unmatched_complex_format_with_inline,
  182:       format_inline_link_with_inline,
  183:       complex_inline_format,
  184:       skip_symbols_in_inline,
  185:       format_header_identifier
  186:     ].
  187: 
  188: bullet_list_tests() ->
  189:     [ singleton_bullet_list,
  190:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  191:       singleton_bullet_list_with_format,
  192:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  193:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  194:       multiline_bullet_indented_list,
  195:       multiline_bullet_indented_list2,
  196:       multiline_bullet_list,
  197:       even_nested_bullet_list,
  198:       odd_nested_bullet_list,
  199:       complex_nested_bullet_list,
  200:       complex_nested_bullet_list2
  201:     ].
  202: 
  203: numbered_list_tests() ->
  204:     [ singleton_numbered_list,
  205:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  206:       singleton_numbered_list_with_format,
  207:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  208:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  209:       multiline_numbered_indented_list,
  210:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2,
  211:       multiline_numbered_list,
  212:       even_nested_numbered_list,
  213:       odd_nested_numbered_list
  214:     ].
  215: 
  216: convert_erlang_html(_Conf) ->
  217:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => [{p, [], [<<"Test">>]}]},
  218:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}}],
  219: 
  220:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ?ERLANG_HTML, none, #{}, Functions),
  221:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  222:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  223:     ok.
  224: 
  225: convert_unknown_format(_Conf) ->
  226:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"<text>Here</text>">>},
  227:     Functions = create_fun(Doc),
  228: 
  229:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"xml">>, Doc, #{},Functions),
  230:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  231:     ok.
  232: 
  233: non_existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  234:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, []),
  235:     _ = compile(Docs),
  236:     ok.
  237: 
  238: hidden_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  239:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, hidden, #{}, []),
  240:     _ = compile(Docs),
  241:     ok.
  242: 
  243: existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  244:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  245:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  246:     #{<<"en">> := HtmlModDoc} = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  247:     H1 = header(1, <<"Here">>),
  248:     [H1] = HtmlModDoc,
  249:     ok.
  250: 
  251: non_existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  252:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(none)),
  253:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  254:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  255:     ok.
  256: 
  257: hidden_doc(_Conf) ->
  258:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(hidden)),
  259:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  260:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  264:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{},
  265:                         create_fun(#{<<"en">> => <<"Test">>})),
  266:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  267:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  268:     ok.
  269: 
  270: h1_test(_Conf) ->
  271:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  272:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  273: 
  274:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [header(1, <<"Here">>)]},
  275:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  276:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  277:     ok.
  278: 
  279: h2_test(_Conf) ->
  280:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n## Header 2">>),
  281:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  282: 
  283:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h2, [], [<<"Header 2">>]}]},
  284:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  285:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  286:     ok.
  287: 
  288: h3_test(_Conf) ->
  289:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n### Header 3">>),
  290:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  291: 
  292:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h3, [], [<<"Header 3">>]}]},
  293:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  294:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  295:     ok.
  296: 
  297: h4_test(_Conf) ->
  298:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"### Here\n#### Header 4">>),
  299:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  300: 
  301:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h3, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]}]},
  302:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  303:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: h5_test(_Conf) ->
  307:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  308:     DocH5 = #{<<"en">> => <<"##### H5">>},
  309:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  310:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH5, #{}}],
  311:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  312: 
  313:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  314:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  315:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  316:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  317:     ExpectedH5 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]} ]},
  318:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  319:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  320:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  321:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH5, #{}} = E2,
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: h6_test(_Conf) ->
  325:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  326:     DocH6 = #{<<"en">> => <<"###### H6\n## H2">>},
  327:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  328:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH6, #{}}],
  329:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  330: 
  331:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  332:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  333:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  334:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  335:     ExpectedH6 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h6, [], [<<"H6">>]},
  336:                                  {h2, [], [<<"H2">>]} ]},
  337:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  338:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  339:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  340:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH6, #{}} = E2,
  341:     ok.
  342: 
  343: 
  344: single_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  345:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  346:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  347: 
  348:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  349:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  350:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  351:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: double_char_for_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  355:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n>> This is a quote">>),
  356:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  357: 
  358:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  359:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  360:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  361:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  362:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  363:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  364:     ok.
  365: 
  366: ignore_three_spaces_before_quote(_Conf) ->
  367:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"   > # Here">>),
  368:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  369: 
  370:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here">>)),
  371:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  372:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: multiple_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  376:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> # Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  377:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  378: 
  379:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here\nThis is a quote">>)),
  380:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  381:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  382:     ok.
  383: 
  384: paragraph_in_between_test(_Conf) ->
  385:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n> A quote\n## Header 2\nBody content">>),
  386:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  387: 
  388:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  389:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  390:                           quote(<<"A quote">>),
  391:                           header(2, <<"Header 2">>),
  392:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  393:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  394:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  395:     ok.
  396: 
  397: paragraph_after_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  398:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n\nBody content">>),
  399:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  400: 
  401:     Expected = #{<<"en">> =>
  402:                      [ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  403:                        p(<<"This is text">>),
  404:                        p(<<"Body content">>)]},
  405:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  406:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  407:     ok.
  408: 
  409: quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  410:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> Quote 1\nThis is text\n> Quote 2\nBody content">>),
  411:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  412: 
  413:     Expected = expected([ quote(<<"Quote 1">>),
  414:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  415:                           quote(<<"Quote 2">>),
  416:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  417:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  418:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: single_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  422:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n    This is code">>),
  423:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  424: 
  425:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  426:                           code(<<"This is code">>)]),
  427:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  428:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  429:     ok.
  430: 
  431: multiple_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  432:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"    # Here\n    This is code\n        Nested Line">>),
  433:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  434: 
  435:     Expected = expected(code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>)),
  436:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  437:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  438:     ok.
  439: 
  440: paragraph_between_code_test(_Conf) ->
  441:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a paragraph\n",
  442:                               "\n",
  443:                               "    # Here\n",
  444:                               "    This is code\n",
  445:                               "        Nested Line\n",
  446:                               "Another paragraph">>),
  447:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  448: 
  449:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"This is a paragraph">>),
  450:                           code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>),
  451:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  452:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  453:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  454:     ok.
  455: 
  456: single_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  457:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  458: ```erlang
  459: test() -> ok.
  460: ```">>),
  461:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  462:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() -> ok.">>)]),
  463:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  464:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  465:     ok.
  466: 
  467: multiple_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  468:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  469: ```erlang
  470: test() ->
  471:   ok.
  472: ```">>),
  473:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  474:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  475:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  476:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: 
  480: paragraph_between_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  481:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a test:
  482: ```erlang
  483: test() ->
  484:   ok.
  485: ```">>),
  486:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  487:     Expected = expected([p(<<"This is a test:">>),
  488:                          code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  489:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  490:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  491:     ok.
  492: 
  493: 
  494: start_with_br_test(_Conf) ->
  495:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  496:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  497:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  498:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  499:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  500:     ok.
  501: 
  502: multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  503:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\nAnother paragraph\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  504:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  505:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>),
  506:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  507:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  508:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  509:     ok.
  510: 
  511: multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  512:   Text = """
  513: Returns a new list `List3`, which is made from the elements of `List1` followed
  514: by the elements of `List2`.
  515: """,
  516:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(list_to_binary(Text)),
  517:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  518:     Expected = expected([p([<<"Returns a new list ">>,
  519:                             inline_code(<<"List3">>),
  520:                             <<", which is made from the elements of ">>,
  521:                             inline_code(<<"List1">>), <<" followed">>,
  522:                             <<"\nby the elements of ">>,
  523:                             inline_code(<<"List2">>), <<".">>])]),
  524:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  525:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  526:     ok.
  527: 
  528: ending_br_test(_Conf) ->
  529:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n">>),
  530:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  531:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  532:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  533:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  534:     ok.
  535: 
  536: begin_comment_test(_Conf) ->
  537:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  538:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  539:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  540:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  541:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  542:     ok.
  543: 
  544: after_paragraph_comment(_Conf) ->
  545:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  546:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  547:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>), p(<<"Test">>)]),
  548:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  549:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  550:     ok.
  551: 
  552: forget_closing_comment(_Conf) ->
  553:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore Test">>),
  554:     {'EXIT', {missing_close_comment, _}} = catch compile(Docs),
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: format_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  558:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# **H1**\n## _H2_\n### `H3`">>),
  559:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  560:     Expected = expected([ header(1, em(<<"H1">>)),
  561:                           header(2, it(<<"H2">>)),
  562:                           header(3, inline_code(<<"H3">>))
  563:                         ]),
  564:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  565:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  566:     ok.
  567: 
  568: format_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  569:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1** *HH* _H2_ __H3__ `code`">>),
  570:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  571:     Expected = expected([ p([ em(<<"H1">>),
  572:                               <<" ">>,
  573:                               it(<<"HH">>),
  574:                               <<" ">>,
  575:                               it(<<"H2">>),
  576:                               <<" ">>,
  577:                               em(<<"H3">>),
  578:                               <<" ">>,
  579:                               inline_code(<<"code">>)
  580:                             ])
  581:                         ]),
  582:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  583:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  584:     ok.
  585: 
  586: format_multiple_inline(_Conf) ->
  587:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 *HH***">>),
  588:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  589:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  590:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  591:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  592:     ok.
  593: 
  594: format_multiple_inline_format_long(_Conf) ->
  595:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 __HH__**">>),
  596:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  597:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, em(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  598:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  599:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  600:     ok.
  601: 
  602: format_multiple_inline_format_short(_Conf) ->
  603:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"_H1 *HH*_">>),
  604:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  605:     Expected = expected([ p([ it([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  606:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  607:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: format_multiple_inline_format_mixed(_Conf) ->
  611:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**__ _there_">>),
  612:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  613:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>, em(<<"test2">>)]),
  614:                               <<" ">>,
  615:                               it(<<"there">>)])
  616:                         ]),
  617:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  618:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  619:     ok.
  620: 
  621: unmatched_format_simple(_Conf) ->
  622:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold*">>),
  623:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  624:     Expected = expected([ p([<<"**Bold*">> ])]),
  625:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  626:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  627: 
  628: unmatched_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  629:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold *Italics*">>),
  630:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  631:     Expected = expected(p([<<"**Bold ">>, it(<<"Italics">>) ])),
  632:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  633:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  634: 
  635: unmatched_complex_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  636:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**_ _there_">>),
  637:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  638:     Expected = expected([ p([ <<"__H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>,
  639:                               em(<<"test2">>),
  640:                               it(<<" ">>),
  641:                               <<"there_">>])
  642:                         ]),
  643:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  644:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  645:     ok.
  646: 
  647: format_inline_link_with_inline(_Config) ->
  648:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"[`splitwith/2`](`splitwith/2`) behaves as if">>),
  649:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  650:     Expected = expected([ p([inline_code(<<"splitwith/2">>),<<" behaves as if">>])]),
  651:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  652:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  653:     ok.
  654: 
  655: complex_inline_format(_Config) ->
  656:   %% The complexity here comes from the _, where the alg needs to backtrack
  657:   %% add the _ to an existing buffer, and continue where it left off using
  658:   %% any previous opening format characters, in this case **.
  659:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}`**">>),
  660:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  661:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}">>)))),
  662:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  663:   ok.
  664: 
  665: skip_symbols_in_inline(_Config) ->
  666:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{the_beginning, the_end}`**">>),
  667:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  668:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{the_beginning, the_end}">>)))),
  669:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  670:   ok.
  671: 
  672: format_header_identifier(_Config) ->
  673:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"## Test {: #id .class} there">>),
  674:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  675:   Expected = expected([{h2, [], [<<"Test  there">>]}]),
  676:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  677:   ok.
  678: 
  679: singleton_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  680:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner">>),
  681:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  682:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))])]),
  683:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  684:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  685:     ok.
  686: 
  687: singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->
  688:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  689:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  690:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  691:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  692:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  693:     ok.
  694: 
  695: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  696:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  697:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  698:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  699:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  700:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  701:     ok.
  702: 
  703: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  704:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  705:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  706:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  707:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  708:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  709:     ok.
  710: 
  711:

  713:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* *One* __liner__">>),
  714:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  715:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))])]),

  717:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),

  726:     ok.

  730:              <<"  * One liner\n  * Second line">>),

  732:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  733:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  735:     ok.

  737: multiline_bullet_indented_list2(_Config) ->

  739:              <<"  * _One liner_\n  * _Second_ `line`">>),
  740:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  741:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  742:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  743:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  744:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  745:     ok.

  747: even_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->

  751:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  752:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),

  754:                                      ])

  756:                             ])]),

  759:     ok.

  765:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),

  767:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  768:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  769:                                      ])
  770:                                 ])
  771:                             ])]),

  773:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  774:     ok.

  776: complex_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  777:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n* Second line">>),
  778:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  779:     Expected = expected([ul([
  780:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  781:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)) ])
  782:                                 ]),
  783:                              li([p(<<"Second line">>)])
  784:                             ])]),
  785:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  786:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  787:     ok.
  788: 
  789: complex_nested_bullet_list2(_Config) ->
  790:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  791: * One liner
  792:   * First nested line
  793:     * Second level nested line
  794:   * Second nested line
  795:     * Another nested line
  796: * Second one liner">>),
  797:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  798:     Expected = expected([ul([
  799:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  800:                                   ul([ li([
  801:                                            p(<<"First nested line">>),
  802:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Second level nested line">>)])])
  803:                                           ]),
  804:                                        li([
  805:                                            p(<<"Second nested line">>),
  806:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Another nested line">>)])])
  807:                                           ])
  808:                                      ])
  809:                                 ]),
  810:                              li([ p(<<"Second one liner">>)])
  811:                             ])]),
  812:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  813:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  814:     ok.
  815: 
  816: singleton_numbered_list(_Config) ->

  820:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  822:     ok.

  831:     ok.

  858: multiline_numbered_indented_list(_Config) ->
  859:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"  1. One liner\n  2. Second line">>),
  860:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  861:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  862:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  869:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  870:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  871:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  872:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  873:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  874:     ok.

  877:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n2. Second line">>),
  878:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  879:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),

  882:     ok.

  884: even_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  885:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line">>),
  886:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  887:     Expected = expected([ol([
  888:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  889:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  890:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  891:                                      ])
  892:                                 ])
  893:                             ])]),
  894:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  896:     ok.
  897: 
  898: odd_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  899:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line\n  3. Third nested line">>),
  900:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  901:     Expected = expected([ol([
  902:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  903:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  904:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  905:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  906:                                      ])
  907:                                 ])
  908:                             ])]),
  909:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  910:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  911:     ok.
  912: 
  913: 
  914: header(Level, Text) when is_integer(Level) ->
  915:     HeadingLevel = integer_to_list(Level),
  916:     HeadingLevelAtom = list_to_existing_atom("h" ++ HeadingLevel),
  917:     {HeadingLevelAtom, [], [Text]}.
  918: 
  919: quote(X) ->
  920:     {pre,[],[{code,[],[X]}]}.
  921: 
  922: code(X) ->
  923:     {pre,[],[inline_code(X)]}.
  924: 
  925: inline_code(X) ->
  926:     {code,[],[X]}.
  927: 
  928: p(X) when is_list(X) ->
  929:     {p, [], X};
  930: p(X) when is_tuple(X); is_binary(X) ->
  931:     p([X]).
  932: 
  933: em(X) when is_list(X) ->
  934:     {em, [], X};
  935: em(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  936:     em([X]).
  937: 
  938: it(X) when is_list(X) ->
  939:     {i, [], X};
  940: it(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  941:     it([X]).
  942: 
  943: ul(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  944:     {ul, [], Items}.
  945: 
  946: ol(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  947:     {ol, [], Items}.
  948: 
  949: li(Item) when is_tuple(Item); is_binary(Item) ->
  950:     li([Item]);
  951: li(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  952:     {li, [], Items}.
  953: 
  954: -spec create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) -> #docs_v1{} when
  955:       Language  :: atom(),
  956:       Mime      :: binary(),
  957:       ModuleDoc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  958:       Metadata  :: map(),
  959:       Docs      :: [{{Kind, Name, Arity},
  960:                      Anno :: erl_anno:anno(),
  961:                      Signature :: [binary()],
  962:                      Doc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  963:                      Metadata :: map()
  964:                     }],
  965:       Kind      :: function | type | callback,
  966:       Name      :: atom(),
  967:       Arity     :: non_neg_integer(),
  968:       DocLanguage :: binary(),
  969:       DocValue :: binary() | term().
  970: create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) ->
  971:     #docs_v1{anno = [],
  972:              beam_language = Language,
  973:              format = Mime,
  974:              module_doc = ModuleDoc,
  975:              metadata = maps:merge(#{ otp_doc_vsn => ?CURR_DOC_VERSION }, Metadata),
  976:              docs = Docs}.
  977: 
  978: extract_moduledoc(Docs) ->
  979:     Docs#docs_v1.module_doc.
  980: 
  981: extract_doc(Docs) ->
  982:     Docs#docs_v1.docs.
  983: 
  984: extract_format(Docs) ->
  985:     Docs#docs_v1.format.
  986: 
  987: create_eep48_doc(Doc) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  988:     create_eep48_doc(Doc, <<"text/markdown">>).
  989: 
  990: create_eep48_doc(Doc, Format) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  991:     Docs = #{<<"en">> => Doc},
  992:     create_eep48(erlang, Format, Docs, #{}, create_fun(Docs)).
  993: 
  994: create_fun(Docs) ->
  995:     [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Docs, #{}}].
  996: 
  997: 
  998: expected(X) when is_list(X)->
  999:     #{<<"en">> => X};
 1000: expected(X) when is_tuple(X) ->
 1001:     expected([X]).
 1002: 
 1003: compile(Docs) ->
 1004:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
 1005:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
 1006:     ?NATIVE_FORMAT = extract_format(HtmlDocs),
 1007:     HtmlDocs.
